TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IColumnMappingCollection implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 包含一个 DataColumnMapping 对象的集合，并由 实现，这是由 .NET Framework 数据提供程序通常使用的方法。

span.span: Contains a collection of DataColumnMapping objects, and is implemented by the , which is used in common by .NET Framework data providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口使继承类实现的列映射集合。The interface enables an inheriting class to implement a ColumnMapping collection. 有关详细信息，请参阅[DataAdapter 数据表和 DataColumn 映射](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md)。For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md). 应用程序不会创建的实例接口直接，但创建继承的类的实例。An application does not create an instance of the interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits . 继承的类必须实现所有继承的成员，且通常定义其他成员来添加提供程序特定的功能。Classes that inherit must implement all inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. 例如，接口定义方法。For example, the interface defines the method. 反过来，类继承此方法，并定义的两个其他重载。In turn, the class inherits this method, and defines two additional overloads of . ## Examples 下面的示例使用派生类的实例到几个对象添加到其集合，然后显示这些列表映射的源表。The following example uses an instance of the derived class, , to several objects to its collection, and then displays a list of those mapped source tables. 此示例假定已创建。This example assumes that a has already been created. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 继承自接口，则应实现以下构造函数：

span.span: When you inherit from the interface, you should implement the following constructor:

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例搜索的派生类中，实例，在内使用给定的源列名称集合。The following example searches for an instance of the derived class, , with the given source column name within a collection. 如果存在，该示例显示的名称和映射的索引。If the exists, the example displays the name and the index of the mapping. 如果映射不存在，此示例将显示错误。If the mapping does not exist, the example displays an error. 此示例假定集合已经创建。This example assumes that a collection has been created. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection.this1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection.this1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection.this1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection.this1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
